name: Henyo Animal Race
description:
Ready, Set, Go! Test your luck and skill in this cute animated animal race game. Collect prize rewards and advance through the levels. Colorful fun and entertainment for all ages.

FEATURES

MULTIPLE PLAYING MODES
• LUCK: Simply choose your racer and cheer him on. Can you guess who will win?
• SKILL: Choose your racer then play the game to outrace your opponents. Select from three levels of difficulty: Easy, Medium, Hard.

MULTIPLE LEVELS
• Five levels of increasing difficulty in Skill mode.

COLORFUL AND FUN
• Colorful graphics, animations, and screen displays.
• Win a race and watch the fireworks display!

PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT
• Developed and backed by Henyo Software, a leader in professional custom software development
• Responsive and timely customer support
• Ongoing updates and feature expansions
• For specific questions, feature requests, and how-to information, visit our knowledge base and support forums at http://www.henyosoftware.com/forums/
